title: Rugby-France team to face England in the Six Nations
text: March 8, 2018 / 8:38 AM / Updated 7 hours ago Rugby-France team to face England in the Six Nations Reuters Staff 1 Min Read PARIS, March 8 (Reuters) - France coach Jacques Brunel on Thursday named the following team to face England at the Stade de France in the Six Nations on Saturday. 15-Hugo Bonneval, 14-Benjamin Fall, 13-Mathieu Bastareaud, 12-Geoffrey Doumayrou, 11-Remy Grosso, 10-Francois Trinh-Duc, 9-Maxime Machenaud, 8-Marco Tauleigne, 7-Yacouba Camara, 6-Wenceslas Lauret, 5-Sebastien Vahaamahina, 4-Paul Gabrillagues, 3-Rabah Slimani, 2-Guilhem Guirado (captain), 1-Jefferson Poirot. Replacements: 16-Adrien Pelissie, 17-Dany Priso, 18-Cedate Gomes Sa, 19-Romain Taofifenua, 20-Kelian Galletier, 21-Baptiste Couilloud, 22-Lionel Beauxis, 23-Gael Fickou. (Reporting by Julien Pretot; Editing by John Oâ€™Brien)
